productHero.infoText: Use special packages that will allow you to quickly localize.

article_1.title: Easy to use
article_1.text: Everything is simple and without unnecessary decisions. The user-friendly interface will ensure intuitive use of the application.

article_2.title: NEW EXPERIENCES
article_2.text: Discover new possibilities for fast and convenient localization. Everything is done so that nothing distracts you from the translation.

article_3.title: Free access
article_3.text: Everything you need is already at the start. No need to pay for regular use of the starter pack.

productHowItWorks.title: How it works
text: We create a project, if necessary, we add co-localizers
Add a file from the suggested formats and localize it.

productCTA.title: leave feedback
productCTA.subText: Always be in touch with us.
